caption.center: PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF MICHIGAN, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. NOAH GEORGE KING,

opinion.opinion_text:
On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the April 21, 1999 decision of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because the defendant has failed to meet the burden of establishing entitlement to relief under MCR 6.508(D).
Markman, J., not participating.
Court of Appeals No. 216072.
